titleStmt.title: Mid-night thoughts, writ, as some think, by a London-Whigg, or, a Westminster-Tory, others think by a Quaker, or, a Jesuit: but call him what they please, they may find him a true penitent of the church of Christ.
titleStmt.author: Killigrew, William, Sir, 1606-1695.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Benj. clark, bookseller, in George-Yard in Lombard-street,

notesStmt.note: With a frontispiece featuring: "Christ praying in ye garden".
With a final leaf of errata.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary, New York, N.Y.
